post:
**General Information:**
 
       ClamHost OpenVZ VPS's with 1024MB of RAM, 15GB of RAID 10 SSD Storage, 1 IPv4 included, 20Gbps DDoS Mitigation, hosted in our quarter cab in Los Angeles. 
       All our VPS are Unmanaged by default, but for an extra $5 Per Month we offer a Full Management on any VPS. We can even help with multiple software configurations!
       Just email sales@clamhost.com if you have any questions relating to any of our products and services.
 
 **Node Specs:**
 
     Dual X5650 / Dual L5520
     72GB RAM DDR3 1333Mhz     ECC
     4X 256GB SSD / 4X 1TB High Performance     HDDs
     Enterprise HP Grade Hardware
     Hardware RAID 10 Adaptec 5805 + BBU

 **Why Choose ClamHost:**
